answer_infer_question.template: Can the answer "{{sentence}}" be inferred from the question "{{question}}" ? ||| {{answer_choices[label]}}

Does_sentence_answer_question.template: Does this sentence "{{sentence}}"  answer this question "{{question}}" ? ||| {{answer_choices[label]}}

yes_vs_no.template: Can this question: "{{question}}" be answered as follow: "{{sentence}}" \ \ please answer yes or no.  ||| {{answer_choices[label]}}

right_answer.template: Does the following sentence "{{sentence}}" seem a right answer for the following question : {{question}} ||| {{answer_choices[label]}}
